name: Krazy Krabs
description:
Captain Nemo's four hermit crabs are searching for building parts to their homes. Scattered parts are lying around on the shore just waiting to be dug up and dragged back to the building site. Gather as many parts as you can before they're washed away by the incoming water!

Game made for Global Game Jam 2019 by:

  • Oskar
  • Michael
  • Andreas
  • Helen
  • Victor
  • Fabian
